sections.title: Using Abstract
sections.description: Abstract lets you manage, version, and document your designs in one place.

sections.title: Manage your account
sections.description: Configure your account settings, such as your email, profile details, and password.

sections.title: Manage organizations, teams, and projects
sections.description: Use Abstract organizations, teams, and projects to organize your people and your work.

sections.title: Authenticate to Abstract
sections.description: Set up and configure SSO, SCIM, and Just-in-Time provisioning.

sections.title: Abstract support
sections.description: Get in touch with a human.
